description:
An investigation of into whether a man by the name, John Jordan, should be a saint leads the examiners to a remote village. The question lingers, was he a prophet or not?
Source: amazon

titles.title: God Bestows Upon Us All His Revelations
Le seigneur est l`origine de toutes les révélations
Omo wa Arayuru Keiji o Tare Tamau
主はあらゆる啓示を垂れ給う
